insights.root_cause: Fluctuations in transactions or data entry errors could cause inconsistencies.
insights.recommendation: Review transaction records for errors or unusual entries.

insights.bucket_description: No clear pattern, but deviation exceeds threshold
insights.root_cause: Random anomalies possibly due to isolated incidents or data entry mistakes.
insights.recommendation: Investigate each case individually to identify specific causes.

insights.bucket_description: Consistent increase or decrease in outstanding balances
insights.root_cause: Systematic changes in business operations or client behavior.
insights.recommendation: Analyze trends in account activities to understand underlying causes.

insights.root_cause: Entries might have been reversed or corrected after initial posting.
insights.recommendation: Verify the legitimacy of reversal or correction entries.

insights.bucket_description: Outstanding balances are not in line with previous months
insights.root_cause: Changes in client activity or misreporting in previous periods.
insights.recommendation: Compare current balances with historical data to identify discrepancies.

insights.bucket_description: Gradual deviation beyond threshold over multiple periods
insights.root_cause: Cumulative errors or gradual changes in financial practices.
insights.recommendation: Monitor trends over time to pinpoint when deviations began.

insights.bucket_description: High volatility in account balances over time
insights.root_cause: Frequent large transactions or unstable financial behavior.
insights.recommendation: Conduct a detailed analysis of transaction history to identify volatility sources.
